Flub.Name: Height
Flub.Description: The height of the generated mountains. When Multiple Octaves is enabled, this setting determines the height of the tallest peak.

Flub.Name: Sprawl
Flub.Description: The extent to which the mountains sprawl outwards from the drawing guides.

Flub.Name: Displacement
Flub.Description: The amount of displacement added to the octave noise.

Flub.Name: Style
Flub.Description: The style to synthesize over the shape.

Flub.Name: Scale
Flub.Description: The scale of the octave noise.

Flub.Name: Erosion
Flub.Description: The amount of pseudo-erosion added to the shape.

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the node's process.
